title: 客户端崩溃 求dalao帮帮穷苦孩子
author: yuiwqer
txt_content:
https://share.weiyun.com/ewiyweCd
debug的链接 太大了附件上传不了
https://share.weiyun.com/VCsPifVW
log的链接
麻烦dalao了

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
删除mocreatures
或在forge.cfg内设置
removeErrorTileEntities
removeErrorEntities
为true

replies.author: yuiwqer
replies.txt_content:
EmptyLava 发表于 2020-6-9 20:31
删除mocreatures
或在forge.cfg内设置
removeErrorTileEntities
没有用dalao
还是会未响应崩溃
新的log
https://share.weiyun.com/MxiJdg91


新的debug
https://share.weiyun.com/CqVpQkKj

replies.author: yuiwqer
replies.txt_content:

.minecraft/config/forge.cfg ，中设置
B:removeErroringEntities=true
B:removeErroringTileEntities=true ...

还是会未响应崩溃

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
yuiwqer 发表于 2020-6-9 21:04
没有用dalao
还是会未响应崩溃

删除服务器 world/region 文件夹中的 r.0.-1.mca 文件
